features: 【4000mAh Battery Operated Fan】Keep cool indoors or outdoors with our portable fan that offers dual power source options. Enjoy 6-15 hours of 4000mah battery power on the go or switch to USB mode for continuous use. Plus, its power bank design makes it a must-have for emergency situations.

【Multiple Use Modes】Stay cool and comfortable in any situation with our versatile personal fan! With a 180 degree tilting design, you can hold it, place it on a desktop, or hang it for the perfect way. Whether you're at home, in the office, or on the go, this fan is the ideal way to beat the heat and stay comfortable.

【Experience Customizable Cooling】Choose your desired level of cooling with the 3 speed settings of our rechargeable fan. From a gentle breeze to a powerful gust, each airflow is thoughtfully crafted to cater to your preferences. The unique square-shaped structure allows for maximum air intake, resulting in high-speed cooling from all angles.

【Compact Design & Ultra Quiet】With dimensions of 6.8*5.3*1.5 inches and a weight of only 10 ounces, this small desk fan folds up to the size of a book, making storage and carry incredibly convenient. Plus, the ultra-quiet operation at less than 45 decibels ensures it won't disturb your work, study or sleep.

【What You Will Get】Otlonpe Small Table Fan comes with a USB-C cable, ensuring you have all you need for immediate use. Our product is backed with a 1-year warranty, and our 24/7 customer service is always ready to address any concerns or queries you have.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience cool breeze anytime, anywhere with the Portable Fan by Otlonpe. This multi-functional fan works as a desk, handheld, and hangable fan and can be powered by USB or battery. It's perfect for home, office, and travel use. No need for multiple fans, the F11 Small Desk Fan has got you covered.

Featuring a 3-speed adjustable design, you can choose between low and medium settings for quiet cooling and air ventilation or crank it up to the powerful third speed for hot weather or outdoor use. Don't suffer through the heat any longer - upgrade to the Otlonpe small table fan today!

Stay cool and connected on-the-go with the Otlonpe small travel fan. With a long-lasting battery that can run continuously for up to 15 hours and the ability to charge your cellphone in emergencies, you'll never have to choose between comfort and convenience again.

Previous page Enjoy the convenience of a rechargeable fan with the power to cool indoor and outdoor spaces. Sturdy small personal fan made of high-quality materials and advanced workmanship Its slim and compact design takes up minimal space and makes it effortless to carry around Keep your devices charged on the go with this versatile fan that doubles as an emergency power bank. Next page 1 180 Degree Tilt & Folding 2 Quiet & High Quality 3 Stable & Soild 4 Ultra-thin & Portable 5 Power Bank Design
Previous page Next page 1 Home Fan 2 Office Fan 3 Bedroom Fan 4 Kitchen Fan 5 Travel Fan

What is the difference between it and the general small USB desk fan? Regular USB desk fans need to be connected to a power source with a USB cable to work. But our rechargeable desk fan is powered by a built-in 4000mah battery, which is more convenient to use and more portable, whether it is indoors or outdoors. How long will the battery last? Otlonpe Desk Fan adopts 2 modes of battery and USB power supply. Battery power mode can last 6-15H. When powered by USB, USB desk fan can work continuously. Battery powered is designed for outdoor & travel, USB powered is used for Home & office. Why are you willing to choose otlonpe battery desk fan? 1. Smaller than other battery fans, more portable; 2. Stronger winds and longer battery life than other portable fans (hand fans, neck fans); 3. Flexible for indoor and outdoor use (USB desk fans can only be used indoors)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this fan almost 2 months.Its winter so I haven’t used it a lot but let me say”I want a few more.”I haven’t found anything wrong with it.I was amazed at the air output..and its rechargeable.I wish I had this fan with me for the year I was in Ghana.Power outages…I would have had amazing air circulation .Its size is perfect. The stand pulls out and it’s balanced. Snap it back and it’s perfect to pack if you are traveling. It will recharge with a battery pack if there is no power. I love this fan.. So now I’m forwarding info to my daughter who lives in Texas. Last summer was too much.. she will love having this on her nightstand .. she will sleep. I strongly recommend this small fan. And the price is very good , too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel fan
reviews.reviewText: Took this on a cruise, it was the perfect size!! Easy to pack, just enough battery life for a nights worth of use, great air movement and good background noise!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get This Fan
reviews.reviewText: I was headed back to Costa Rica and needed a portable fan. So glad I can across this one. it has both USB and USB-C but this use the UBS-C for charging or as the port to use with a wall plug. The charge last long - I had this tiny but mighty fan going on high power nearly 8 hours before it died without a charge. Oh and cooling action - it definitely works for cooling you down. It’s got three settings and all move air well. Sound wise it’s not the most quiet fan but if you need sound or air moving to sleep - it will meet both these needs. It’s light weight and I appreciate that is fold and has a stand that’s adjustable. I’m ordering a few more to send to my family back home so they too can keep cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything works great. I just wish it had more options for angling. If this is on a nightstand and you're sleeping the air will not blow on you unless your bed is higher. I used this on a cruise ship and the bed is actually lower than the integrated nightstands. I was able to modify the angle enough yo get direct airflow. Operating wise, no issues and the rechargeable battery last a long time i.e. throughout the night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't charge enough to run for any amount of time
reviews.reviewText: I unpacked it and put it on the charger overnight. I assume it charged, but there is no light indicating that it is or isn't. Then I fired it up on level 3 and it lasted about 5 minutes before it died. It doesn't even run for more than a few minutes when plugged in.I wish I could re-buy the fan I bought last year, it works wonderfully (I need a second). But now I just have to return this one and try again, and it's a huge pain to do that.Save your time and money and keep shopping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Great travel fan, it worked all night and wasn't too loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little fan
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a recent trip overseas... More for the white noise than for the wind-blowing, but both worked pretty well! The noise was loud enough to drown out nearby annoyances, and the breeze was a godsend when I got stuck in a too-hot room. Its flat design also fit well in a suitcase under my clothes. (Thought the cord was a little short... Sometimes I had to move furniture around to get near a plug.) Overall I recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Fan
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic little fan. It puts out a lot of air even on the lowest speed. It has 3. It also stays charged for a long time. While I don’t use it daily, I’ve yet to have to charge it again. Lightweight. Would recommend!

I needed a fan to take with me when I traveled. It's compact enough that I could put it in my carry-on. Rechargeable battery with USB cord, that's included (but not the plug in cube) which made it even more convenient as no need to carry extra batteries. It has 3 speeds, all very quiet. This fan would also be good for RV or tent when camping. Would be good on the desk while working as well.I highly recommend it, if you as looking for a small traveled/ desk fan.
Perfect fan for daughters nursery. 3 speeds & USB charger. Exactly what we wanted

I was on a hunt for a desk fan but I didn’t want to spend a fortune on one if it ended being noisy and loud. Another factor was if it was too bulky and didn’t fit in a good place on my desk. The size is honestly perfect and I love that it’s so slim and it also acts as a power bank was an added bonus! Love that it’s rechargeable and doesn’t need to be plugged in just for it to work. I like the speeds but 3 seems a little to loud for the office environment so I might just keep it at 1. Overall I’m glad I got this one as I had another one on my mind.

This worked great as a desk fan for my office at work. The building can get a bit stuffy and this fan is powerful enough to be useful but quiet enough not to bother the other people in the office. I usually leave it plugged in so i can't speak to battery life but the fact that there is a battery is a bonus. Definitely recommend.

The media could not be loaded. This fan on high speed could not even blow the thin plastic cover that came in the box. This fan is worthless under no circumstance. Should anyone attempt to purchase this fan
